verses.name: 1 Samuel 5:1
verses.text: And the Philistines took the ark of God, and brought it from Eben–ezer unto Ashdod.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 5:2
verses.text: When the Philistines took the ark of God, they brought it into the house of Dagon, and set it by Dagon.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 5:3
verses.text: And when they of Ashdod arose early on the morrow, behold, Dagon was fallen upon his face to the earth before the ark of the Lord. And they took Dagon, and set him in his place again.
